title: Introducing: Strad
body:
Only in this wondrous digital age could I stumble across the slightly abstract and glitch-y house stylings of a Hungarian producer called **Norbert Poljakovics**, a.

k.a **Strad**. Now you might be thinking ‘wait a mo, Norbert doesn’t sound particularly Hungarian’, and to be honest, you’d be right. However there is very little other information about **Strad** posted online, other than a singular bandcamp track and a well stocked soundcloud account.

Therefore I’m willing to look past this slight oddity and enjoy the mesmerizing sound **Strad** has crafted, as he works an infused hip hop beat into a series of subtle samples, leaving the track feeling eloquent yet gritty.
